TopicTitle: Separate program to create planets for each save file

Articles.Content: If such a thing does not already exist, how difficult would it be to create a program that allows users to generate a planet (based on parameters like the ones in-game follow) that could then be added into the Kerbol system at a adjustable height/velocity, etc.?

Space Engine does that all the time in under a minute.

KSP doesn't own Space Engine, though.
